channel.title: Single Player Sandbox Mode
channel.description: I'm trying to learn the game and a sandbox mode where I can start a game by myself, pause the game and swap the player that I'm controlling would be incredibly useful. With this, it would be much easier to reproduce bugs and learn what combinations of abilities will generate what feedback.

item.title: Single Player Sandbox Mode
item.dc:creator: nakomaru
item.description:
That would be nice, but wouldn’t help with testing bugs. I don’t know if debauching an assassin’s 2-for-1 is giving me two redirect messages and 0 “attacked but immune” messages is because it’s bugged, or if it’s because he was also occupied.
